overview: Odavum Mudiyathu Oliyavum Mudiyathu (lit. Can't Run, Can't Hide) is an upcoming Tamil horror action comedy film written and directed by debutant Ramesh Venkat and produced by Sathyamurthi. The film is cast from popular YouTube channels such as Eruma Saani and Madras Central.
title: Odavum Mudiyathu Oliyavum Mudiyathu
